unicalculator.model

Class Assessment

  • java.lang.Object
    • unicalculator.model.Assessment

  • public class Assessment
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an assessment task in a Course.

    A Course is made up of many assessments.

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Type Property and Description

      Gets the name of this Assessment as a StringProperty

      • Assessment

                  double weighting,
                  double markReceived,
                  double outOf)
        Constructor for Assessment
        Parameters:
        assessmentName - the name of the assessment task
        weighting - the weighting for the assessment task
        markReceived - the mark the student received for the assessment task
        outOf - the maximum mark student can receive for specific assessment task
